subject: AI & Agents
title: Stable Diffusion: Open-Source Image AI
description: A 60-second lesson on Stable Diffusion: Open-Source Image AI.

hook.text: In 2022, Stability AI released its image model for free. Anyone could generate art on their own GPU.

buildup.text: Stable Diffusion runs in latent space â€” compressing images before diffusing, making it efficient.

discovery.text: It can run on consumer GPUs. No API, no subscription, no censorship by a corporation.

twist.text: Open release meant no guardrails. Harmful content generation became trivially easy.

climax.text: The open-source community built ControlNet, LoRA, and thousands of fine-tuned models on top.

punchline.text: Open the gates and the community builds a city.

quiz.question: What made Stable Diffusion significant in the AI art space?
options: It was open-source and could run on consumer hardware
It was the first image generation model ever
It could only generate text, not images
